greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest k such that 7^k has exactly n 4's in its decimal representation.
mathematica: a = {}; Do[k = 1; While[ Count[ IntegerDigits[7^k], 4] != n, k++ ]; a = Append[a, k], {n, 0, 50} ]; a
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 10 2001
ext: Name corrected by _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Jun 26 2018
